item.description:
Before signing up for this event, Please read the entire Write Up and understand and agree to the enclosed Liability Waiver.

Event Rating: Easy
Distance: 2.5 Miles
Time Duration: ~1.25 Hours
Blaze Orange: not required

Wickaboxet Wildlife Management Area was used years ago for picnics and outdoor recreation.  That was before a devastating fire in the '50's turned the place into brush fields and brambles. Now it is a lightly used WMA, which is becoming a forest again.

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Wickaboxet Management Area was the first state forest. At 679 acres in West Greenwich just south of the Coventry line, it was later over shadowed by the much larger Arcadia Management Area. This is a short 2 1/2 mile hike, but it is a scenic walk in an interesting area with a nice vantage point atop the Rattlesnake Ledge. This hike should take about 1 1/4 hours. It is mostly flat with some small hills, except for the short climb to the top of Rattlesnake Ledge.

Please note that while we are doing the Wickaboxet hike, we are parking at Tillinghast Pond. Parking at Wickaboxet is very limited, so we will do a very short (<5 minute) carpool from Tillinghast to Wickaboxet.

 

Directions to Parking:

From I-95, take Exit 5B - Route 102 North. Follow Route 102 for 3 miles, then turn left onto Plain Meetinghouse Road. Turn right at the intersection with Plain Road. Follow Plain Road for 1/2 mile to the parking lot on the right

Liability Waiver As a condition of your voluntary participation in this activity you acknowledge and agree to the following: this activity involves inherent risks that can cause property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death to participants and/or others; you assume all risk associated with this activity; you are responsible for having the necessary knowledge, skills, abilities, clothing, and equipment to safely participate in this activity; you know and will follow the Hiker Responsibility Code described at www.hikesafe.com; the leader(s) of this activity are volunteers; and you for yourself, your heirs, executors, and administrators release, hold harmless, and indemnify the leader(s) and all members of this group from any and all claims for property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death - including those caused by negligence and/or other reasons.


Safety First!

group.name: Rhode Island Hiking Club " Walks and Rambles "

item.name: Wickaboxet (Ken Weber Hike #20)
